recipesJson.name: Chilled to the core
recipesJson.author: Hackett141
recipesJson.description:
Crisp, chilly and a nice little mix for any fan of menthol with the added taste of apple
I would say that although I did create this myself 
It's very simple and every chance it's all been done before.
Having said that, sometimes keeping it simple to achieve what you set out for is a thing of greatness.

This recipe is still being tweeked and I may update this.
Depending on your love of menthol I would say start at 3% maybe go 4%
